price: (25) So We took retribution from them; then see how was the end of the deniers.
arabic: فَٱنتَقَمۡنَا مِنۡهُمۡۖ فَٱنظُرۡ كَيۡفَ كَانَ عَٰقِبَةُ ٱلۡمُكَذِّبِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: fa-intaqamnā min'hum fa-unẓur kayfa kāna ʿāqibatu al-mukadhibīna
